Welcome to the UVa Hydroinformatics Group

Our goal is to solve societyâ€™s most challenging water resources problems by using concepts from cyber-physical systems to advance understanding, analysis, and management of built and natural water systems. We are housed within the interdisciplinary Link Lab, a cross-cutting initiative within the Engineering School at the University of Virginia that brings together faculty and students from across five departments with a shared focus on cyber-physical systems.
